description:
Don't be surprised if the lightweight, earthy feeling of this flannel becomes your new go-to. Because their Westbrook Flannel for men has exactly that, and a whole lot more.

That soft organic feeling we mentioned comes from a sustainable blend of organic cotton and hemp. Plus, the Westbrook was made by prana's Fair Trade Certified™ Factory partners, so it's a style you can truly feel good about.

On the front you'll find not one, but two chest pockets. And for an extra level of security, they gave them button-flap closures too. And finally, they added side seam triangle patches as a hem detail, to give your look a little extra something.
name: Prana Westbrook Flannel Shirt - Standard - Mens
